caption.p: Histopathology of the liver. Light micrographs of the liver sections from different treatment groups. The numbers on the images represent the treatment groups. (a) Control rats, (b) rats treated with the aqueous extract of HS (500 mg/kg), (c) rats treated with the aqueous extract of HS (1000 mg/kg), and (d) rats treated with the aqueous extract of HS (2000 mg/kg).
